name: babel-plugin-logs-paths
description: Add path info to log output.

scripts.build-test: rimraf ./lib && npm run build && npm test
scripts.copypackage: cpy package.json ./lib && cpy README.md ./lib && cpy LICENSE ./lib
scripts.dist: npm run build && npm run copypackage && cd ./lib && npm publish
